mapper.update:
update agreement_finance
agreement_id = #{agreementId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
money = #{money,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status_code = #{statusCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status_des = #{statusDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
adviser = #{adviser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
first_party = #{firstParty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remarks_detail = #{remarksDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remit_code = #{remitCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remit_des = #{remitDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remit_date = #{remitDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remit_account = #{remitAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gathering_account = #{gatheringAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
delete_flag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update agreement_finance set agreement_id = #{agreementId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, money = #{money,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status_code = #{statusCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status_des = #{statusDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, adviser = #{adviser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, first_party = #{firstParty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks_detail = #{remarksDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remit_code = #{remitCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remit_des = #{remitDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remit_date = #{remitDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remit_account = #{remitAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gathering_account = #{gatheringAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delete_flag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select A.id , A.agreement_id AS agreementId, A.money , A.adviser , A.first_party AS firstParty, A.status_code AS statusCode, A.status_des AS statusDes, A.remit_code AS remitCode, A.remit_des AS remitDes, A.remit_date AS remitDate, A.remit_account AS remitAccount, A.gathering_account AS gatheringAccount, A.remarks, B.proxy_cost AS proxyCost, B.government_cost AS governmentCost from agreement_finance A left join resource_agreement B on A.agreement_id=B.agreement_id where A.delete_flag!='1'
limit #{offset}, #{limit}
select count(1) from agreement_finance where delete_flag!='1'

select A.id , A.agreement_id AS agreementId, A. money , A.adviser , A.first_party AS firstParty, A.remit_code AS remitCode, A.remit_des AS remitDes, A.remit_date AS remitDate, A.remit_account AS remitAccount, A.gathering_account AS gatheringAccount, A.remarks, B.proxy_cost AS proxyCost, B.government_cost AS governmentCost from agreement_finance A left join resource_agreement B on A.agreement_id=B.agreement_id where A.adviser=#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and A.status_code=#{statusCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and A.delete_flag!='1'
limit #{offset}, #{limit}
